name: LiveContainer (nightly)
subtitle: LiveContainer (nightly) official AltStore Source.
description:
This is the official AltStore Source for LiveContainer (nightly).

 Run iOS apps without actually installing them!

apps.name: LiveContainer (nightly)
apps.subtitle: Run iOS apps without actually installing them!
apps.versionDescription:
Nightly build from [95b5cd0](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/commit/95b5cd0): Migrate to litehook, unify LCMachOUtils, fixes for simulator

This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/LiveContainer/LiveContainer/actions/runs/16139748301/attempts/1).
apps.localizedDescription: Run iOS apps without actually installing them!
